definition: you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
lit. you die, I live (idiom); irreconcilable adversaries/two parties cannot coexist
lit. you fight, I snatch (idiom); to compete fiercely offering no quarter/fierce rivalry/tug-of-war

pinyin: shen2 me5 feng1 ba3 ni3 chui1 lai2 de5

definition: you and I/everyone/all of us (in society)/we (people in general)
You figure it out for yourself./Do as you please.
you all (archaic)/see also 你們|你们[ni3 men5]
lit. you hit the high road, I'll cross the log bridge (idiom)/fig. you go your way, I'll go mine/you do it your way, I'll do it mine
pinyin: ni3 zou3 ni3 de5 Yang2 guan1 Dao4 , wo3 guo4 wo3 de5 du2 mu4 qiao2
containing_words.word: 你走你的阳关道，我过我的独木桥

definition: lit. you hit the high road, I'll cross the log bridge (idiom)/fig. you go your way, I'll go mine/you do it your way, I'll do it mine

sentences.english: Your willingness to sacrifice countless late nights consoling them?
sentences.chinese: 或者是因为你愿意花费无数的夜晚去安慰他们？

sentences.english: You’re probably one of those weirdos that doesn’t drink coffee in the morning either.
sentences.chinese: 而且你可能也是那种早晨不用喝咖啡的古怪人。

sentences.english: Sucess depends on your endeavor and capability.
sentences.chinese: 成功与否取决于你的努力和能力。

sentences.english: As soon as you prove to be good, you will get more followers.
sentences.chinese: 如果事实证明你还不错，必定会有更多追随者。

sentences.english: I grant that yours are of better quality.
sentences.chinese: 我授与你的是有较好的质量。

sentences.english: Would my take you hand, would you understand Just how I feel?
sentences.chinese: 我能牵起你的手感受我的内心吗？

sentences.english: "I'm so glad to see you, " said Carrie, pleased and yet nonplussed.
sentences.chinese: “看见你我太高兴了，”嘉莉说，既高兴又为难。

sentences.english: LX, do you see in the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 楼下的，又看见你在上网了。

sentences.english: Use old newspaper to line your kitty litter box or your kitchen garbage can.
sentences.chinese: 用旧报纸垫你的猫沙盒或厨房垃圾桶。

sentences.english: You know, Uncle Brendan, I am really glad you invited me here.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，布莱登叔叔，我真的很高兴你邀请我们来。

sentences.english: You know, Uncle Brendan, I am really glad you invited me here.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，布莱登叔叔，我真的很高兴你邀请我们来。

sentences.english: Is your focus on productivity starting to make you feel miserable or stressed out?
sentences.chinese: 如果你追求效能时开始感到痛苦或是精疲力竭？

sentences.english: No buts. You tin melodrama extinction afterward.
sentences.chinese: 别说可是，还轮不到你绝种呢。

sentences.english: I loved you tenderness and candor.
sentences.chinese: 我曾柔情似水满怀真挚地爱过你。

sentences.english: J: You have a very busy life. Lots of a week activies.
sentences.chinese: 你生活很充实啊，有很多的活动。

sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表达“我有这样子的感觉，没问题吧？”

definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
